==== Notes ====
^(1)^ External monitor works without pressing any button indicating that the external VGA port is activated all the time.

^(2)^ Resolution and Refresh rate are the same as for the panel which is suboptimal and my monitor also doesn't like it and has problems displaying everything.

^(3)^ The keys control the volume by hardware. Additionally (and superfluously) the key-presses are captured and the volume is additionally turned up/down in software.

^(4)^ Works with the sl-modem driver.

^(5)^ Works after installing irda-utils.

^(6)^ The CD-drive of my laptop is broken, so I'm using a USB DVD drive.

^(7)^ The keys generate X events, but they are bound to nothing.

^(8)^ The keys generate X events, but they should be bound to the right keysyms. And applications such as firefox should react to those keysyms.

N/A means that the machine has no such hardware

HW means that the function is provided by hardware or BIOS (i.e. it works without any OS support)
